holidays.title: Super Bowl Sunday
holidays.description: On the first Sunday in February, America's love affair with football springs into full bloom.

holidays.title: Autism Sunday
holidays.description: Take time to say a prayer today for those affected by autism spectrum disorders.

holidays.title: Chocolate Day
holidays.description: Everything tastes better with chocolate, so come and explore Chocolate Day in India with us.

holidays.title: Gwyl Mabsant
holidays.description: Gŵyl Mabsant is a rural festival that takes place every year in Wales.

holidays.title: Man Day
holidays.description: Fathers, friends, colleagues, and gym buddies — celebrate every man in your life on Man Day.

holidays.title: Mother's Day Norway
holidays.description: This day is a special family holiday to celebrate mothers and wives.

holidays.title: National Bagel and Lox Day
holidays.description: Bagel season is here! So just relax and eat one bagel… or three.

holidays.title: National Cut the Cord Day
holidays.description: Cut the cord, take control, and embrace affordability, flexibility, and convenience today.

holidays.title: National Develop Alternative Vices Day
holidays.description: Discover and enjoy new and alternative activities on National Develop Alternative Vices Day.

holidays.title: National Homegating Day
holidays.description: National Homegating Day is for Super Bowl Sunday fans who cannot be at the games personally.

holidays.title: National Toothache Day
holidays.description: They are not worth celebrating, but we can learn to stop toothaches for good.

holidays.title: Pizza Pie Day
holidays.description: Let’s celebrate one of America’s all-time favorite foods on Pizza Pie Day!

holidays.title: Pork Rind Appreciation Day
holidays.description: You’re in for a swell time with pork rinds and a fun, sporty day!

holidays.title: Read In The Bathtub Day
holidays.description: No time to read? Do it in the bathtub, it sinks in deeper in there.

holidays.title: St Maroun Day
holidays.description: St. Maroun always sought new ways to accumulate all the treasures of wisdom.

holidays.title: Super Chicken Wing Day
holidays.description: It’s time to put that appetite to the test with Super Chicken Wing Day!

holidays.title: World Marriage Day
holidays.description: Today, we reflect on the beautiful gift of marriage and celebrate enduring love!

holidays.title: Bella Poarch’s Birthday
holidays.description: There is nothing this fantastic TikTok star can’t accomplish. Her creativity knows no bounds.

holidays.title: Craig Conover’s Birthday
holidays.description: He’s a finance expert who became a lawyer, a television personality, and an actor!

holidays.title: DJ Prince’s Birthday
holidays.description: For this young YouTuber, the journey into content creation started early and he’s doing really well.

holidays.title: Jalen Green’s Birthday
holidays.description: For this dedicated shooting guard, we will be here for all his next moves.

holidays.title: Johnny Suh’s Birthday
holidays.description: For the ‘JohFam’, the name Johnny Suh calls his fans, we hope he rocks your world.

holidays.title: Chung-ha Kim’s Birthday
holidays.description: For this butter-voiced singer, we can’t wait to see what her next move will be!

holidays.title: Tom Hiddleston’s Birthday
holidays.description: To the gorgeous, talented actor, Tom Hiddleston, we say, “Keep soaring high!”
